## Question 1 

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(repurrrsive)
library(listviewer)

```

```{r}

Link <- "https://www.imdb.com/best-of/highest-rated-movies-of-2019/ls091392448/"
page = read_html(Link)
MovieTitles2019 = page%>% 
  html_nodes(".lister-item-header a")%>%
  html_text()

Movieratings2019 = page%>% 
  html_nodes(".ratings-imdb-rating strong")%>%
  html_text()

moviesdataframe = data.frame(MovieTitles2019, Movieratings2019)
moviesdataframe


```

## Question 2

```{r}

parse_number(Movieratings2019)

```

```{r}

parse_number(Movieratings2019) -> y
y


```
```{r}

summary(y)

## a) Min - 6.5
## b) Max- 8.6
## c) Q1- 7.075
## d) Median - 7.300
## e) Q3- 7.600
## f) Mean 7.420


```
